column2: Large tumor on the right side--hindering eye sight, lethargic, possible ulceration of tumor, slowed breathing rate, another tumor found on right shoulder
DCT-TVA; Braf; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, primary tumor, spleen, additional peritoneal met

Tumor was found largely on the right side of head; another tumor founded on right shoulder, large peritoneal metastatic tumor found encapsulating kidneys, enlarged spleen; skull in tact; H&L looked alright upon visual inspection
